articles.title: 'Recipe for disaster': Ponting picks apart England batters | HCL Ashes Analysis - cricket.com.au
articles.description: Australia's all-time leading Test run-scorer Ricky Ponting picks apart the techniques of under-fire England batters Rory Burns, Haseeb Hameed and Ollie Pope ...
